div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:55 am CDT

div.div: A 10 percent chance of showers after 5pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 72. South wind 11 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.
A 50 percent chance of showers, mainly after 7pm. Cloudy, with a low around 52. South southwest wind 7 to 14 mph becoming east after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 21 mph.
A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly before 10am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. North wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 16 mph.
